name: landuse
description:
The landuse command extracts land use and land cover polygons from OSM data. Categories include:

- Residential, commercial, industrial
- Agricultural (farmland, orchards)
- Recreation (parks, playgrounds)
- Natural (forest, grass, scrub)
- Infrastructure (railway, parking)

Calculates area for all parcels.

options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)
options.--category: Filter by category: residential, commercial, industrial, agricultural, recreation, institutional, natural, infrastructure, other, all (default: all)

output:
Land use polygons with:
- landuse: OSM landuse tag value
- category: Grouped category
- name: Parcel name
- area_sqm: Area in square meters
- area_ha: Area in hectares
